description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Features:

SLIDESNET-24431	Support for animated Gif image in Aspose.Slides
SLIDESNET-27092	ActiveX controls within slide
SLIDESNET-30296	Support for copying rich text in text frames/text holders
SLIDESNET-33472	Including Slide notes in Tiff image of the presentation as in case of PdfNotes
SLIDESNET-33622	Support for adding leader line for Pie chart labels
SLIDESNET-33749	Setting pie chart slices angle of rotation

	Enhancement:

SLIDESNET-33596	Setting relative path for audio frame link does not work for Mac


	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-30835	Added Image failed to get rendered in PDF using Aspose.Slides for .NET 5.5 client profile 4 dll
SLIDESNET-32061	Equation Editor Formulas don't change color of symbols according to slide background
SLIDESNET-32403	ChartSeriesEx.MarkerFill returns null
SLIDESNET-33351	Graph missing in generated thumbnails
SLIDESNET-33400	3D Percent Stacked Column Chart perspective and labels
SLIDESNET-33556	Chart is improperly cloned in slide
SLIDESNET-33558	Chart failed to get rendered in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33576	Text font family and color change during cloning
SLIDESNET-33628	Unable to access embedded Excel file after saving the presentation
SLIDESNET-33667	Argument Exception thrown on saving cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-33725	Vertical aligned footer, date and slide number are missing in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33775	Date, Slide number and Footer properties failed to apply on cloned slides
SLIDESNET-33776	Date, Slide number and Footer properties only apply on first presentation slide
SLIDESNET-33777	NullReference exception on generating slide thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33780	The slide placeholder position and direction gets changed when saving POTX to PPTX
SLIDESNET-33789	Updating Aspose generated chart data in PowerPoint does not affect the chart
SLIDESNET-33790	Chart title returned empty string from template presentation
SLIDESNET-33797	Problem loading Aspose.Slides license in customer application
SLIDESNET-33803	Setting plot area height does not work
SLIDESNET-33811	Adding custom label to series adds the labels for rest of categories series data automatically
SLIDESNET-33816	Incorrect shape formatting after adding slide's clone
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
